attributes.action: Nigel Farage to lead the delegation negotiating terms for leaving the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farage  is available, highly experienced in European politics and  best placed to provide the committed leadership needed to drive through the negotiations.  We can trust him to get the best Brexit deal for Britain.
attributes.background:
Britain needs a tough and passionate negotiator to ensure that our vote to LEAVE the EU is fully respected and that the Brexit negotiations achieve complete freedom from the EU. 

We want Nigel Farage to lead the Brexit negotiations.
